## EnrollmentContext.getJWT() method

Returns user identity in a form of authentication token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getJWT(): JSONWebToken;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`JSONWebToken`

## Remarks

The user must be authenticated.
